title: My computers mouses wire has a small hole in one part of it and now a bit of wire is exposed, how should I fix it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Considering the low cost simple replace it with a new one that will be more up to date as well. You won't get any kind of electric shock from the wire but bare wires are not good as any liquid spilt could cause damage beyond the monse. So bin and replace it.
